title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 600 - General Provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 600 - General Provisions

State Regulations
§ 600.1 - Applications for establishment
§ 600.2 - Requirements for approval
§ 600.3 - Amendments and modifications to applications
§ 600.4 - Withdrawals or abandonment of applications and failure to satisfy contingencies
§ 600.5 - Revocation, limitation or annulment of approvals of establishment
§ 600.6 - Hearings
§ 600.7 - Decisions
§ 600.8 - Criteria for determining the operation of diagnostic or treatment center under article 28 of the public health law
§ 600.9 - Governing authority or operator
§ 600.10 - Agents, nominees and fiduciaries
§ 600.11 - Name changes of operators and medical facilities

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 600

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 2801-a, 2803[2][a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
